meta.title: AI Home Staging App | Sell & Rent Properties Faster with Virtual Design
meta.description: AI-powered home staging app for private sellers, Airbnb hosts, and DIY homeowners. Instantly enhance property photos, remove clutter, and create stunning real estate visuals to sell or rent faster.
meta.keywords: AI home staging, virtual staging, real estate photo enhancement, property photo AI, home listing optimization, Airbnb photo improvement, DIY home seller, sell house faster
meta.ogTitle: AI Home Staging App | Sell & Rent Faster
meta.ogDescription: Transform property photos with AI. Remove clutter, improve lighting, and virtually stage interiors in seconds.

hero.description: Turn any interior or exterior photo into a stunning, professionally staged listing in seconds. No renovation needed. No designer costs. Just AI-Powered Home Staging.

benefits.title: Home Staging Pro App. Stage Your Listing in a Click, Sell It in a Week
benefits.subtitle: <mark>Professional staging without the wait or cost</mark>

items.title: Instant Home Glow up
items.description: Turn cluttered rooms into magazine-worthy listings instantly — no designers needed.

items.title: AI Magic Wand
items.description: Automatically remove clutter, enhance lighting, and redesign any room with a single click.

items.title: Sell Homes Faster
items.description: Stop waiting months — staged homes sell 40% faster.

priceList.title: PRICE LIST
priceList.subtitle: <mark>for those who don’t use InteriorDesign app</mark>

items.text: You hire a designer, they wait ........ $2500
You hire a designer, you disagree ..... $4000
You do everything again and again ..... $8000

items.title: Homeowners Selling Their Homes Privately
items.desc1: <mark>Easily prepare your home photos for online listings</mark> — no agents, no expensive staging.
items.desc2: Upload your photos, describe what you'd like changed, and let AI instantly declutter, brighten, and restyle your rooms.

items.title: DIY Home Sellers on Real Estate Marketplaces
items.desc1: Make your property stand out among thousands of listings.
items.desc2: Even if you're selling your home on your own, <mark>AI virtual staging transforms ordinary photos into professional, magazine-quality images</mark>.

items.title: Short-Term Rental Hosts (Airbnb, Booking, Hotels, Cian, Avito, Trivago, Expedia, Agoda)
items.desc1: Get more bookings with stunning, well-staged photos.
items.desc2: <mark>AI staging declutters, brightens, and styles interiors</mark> — helping your property look cozy, welcoming, and guest-ready.

items.title: Families Preparing to Move
items.desc1: Show your home's full potential before you relocate.
items.desc2: Whether your rooms are empty or packed with moving boxes, <mark>AI staging can virtually refurnish and decorate</mark> them — helping buyers imagine themselves living there.

items.title: Homeowners After Renovation or Redecoration
items.desc1: Highlight your renovation results with professionally staged visuals.
items.desc2: Use AI <mark>to visualize your space in styles</mark> — like Scandinavian, modern, or minimalist — and make your listing photos shine.

styles.title: Choose Your Style
styles.subtitle: From modern minimalism to cozy warmth — create a style that matches your property.
styles.note: Photography, all 4 in a row, by Nicole Franzen - she is great!

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Listings?
cta.subtitle: Start with 2 free transformations. No credit card required.
